Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-3652 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.14-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-3652 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.14-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libreswan is earlier than 4.14-2, affected by CVE-2024-3652
